content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate factory at position(0, 0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)

### Electricity generator at position(0, 0)
Consists of steam engine (position not specified), boiler (position not specified), and offshore pump (position not specified)

### Copper plate mine at position(-28.5, -61.5)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a furnace (position not specified)

### Iron plate mine at position(-15.5, -50.5)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a furnace (position not specified)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to insufficient ingredients
- Check the inventory for required ingredients before attempting to craft or build. Ensure you have the necessary resources available.
